mapper.insert: insert into member(id, pw, name, phone, email) values (#{member.id}, #{member.pw}, #{member.name}, #{member.phone}, #{member.email})
mapper.select: select * from member where id = #{id} and valid='I'
select * from member where name = #{name} and email = #{email}
select * from member where id = #{id} and name = #{name} and email = #{email}
